episode.title: 好きな子がめがねを忘れた
The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses
Suki na Ko ga Megane o Wasureta
episode.summary: Komura has a crush on a peculiar girl named Mie, who he has known for exactly three days. She forgot her glasses today, and somehow, that makes her even cuter even though she can`t really see anything. Source: crunchyroll
